verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_1: A questioner questioned the imminent torment.
verse.verse_2: For the disbelievers; none can repel it.
verse.verse_3: From God, Lord of the Ways of Ascent.
verse.verse_4: Unto Him the angels and the Spirit ascend on a Day the duration of which is fifty thousand years.
verse.verse_5: So be patient, with sweet patience.
verse.verse_8: On the Day when the sky will be like molten brass.
verse.verse_9: And the mountains will be like tufted wool.
verse.verse_10: No friend will care about his friend.
verse.verse_11: They will be shown each other. The criminal wishes he would be redeemed from the punishment of that Day by his children.
verse.verse_12: And his spouse, and his brother.
verse.verse_13: And his family that sheltered him.
verse.verse_14: And everyone on earth, in order to save him.
verse.verse_15: By no means! It is a Raging Fire.
verse.verse_17: It invites him who once turned his back and fled.
verse.verse_20: Touched by adversity, he is fretful.
verse.verse_21: Touched by good, he is ungenerous.
verse.verse_23: Those who are constant at their prayers.
verse.verse_24: And those in whose wealth is a rightful share.
verse.verse_25: For the beggar and the deprived.
verse.verse_26: And those who affirm the Day of Judgment.
verse.verse_27: And those who fear the punishment of their Lord.
verse.verse_28: Their Lord's punishment is not to be taken for granted.
verse.verse_29: And those who guard their chastity.
verse.verse_30: Except from their spouses or those living under their control, for then they are free of blame.
verse.verse_31: But whoever seeks to go beyond that-these are the transgressors.
verse.verse_32: And those who honor their trusts and their pledges.
verse.verse_33: And those who stand by their testimonies.
verse.verse_34: And those who are dedicated to their prayers.
verse.verse_35: These will be honored in Gardens.
verse.verse_36: What is with those who disbelieve, stretching their necks towards you.
verse.verse_37: From the right, and from the left, banding together?
verse.verse_38: Is every one of them aspiring to be admitted into a Garden of Bliss?
verse.verse_39: No indeed! We created them from what they know.
verse.verse_40: I swear by the Lord of the Easts and the Wests, that We are Able.
verse.verse_41: To replace them with better than they, and We are not to be outdone.
verse.verse_42: So leave them to blunder and play, until they meet their Day which they are promised.
verse.verse_43: The Day when they will emerge from the tombs in a rush, as though they were hurrying towards a target.
verse.verse_44: Their eyes cast down; overwhelmed by humiliation. This is the Day which they were promised.
